column1: Wildberry Pancakes and Cafe////Wildberry Cafe was some distance from my hotel
column2: but it was worth the walk.  The pancakes are a good as you can get
column3: and they come in 2 serving sizes so you don't have to stuff yourself if you're not a lumberjack.  I had the strawberry glaze pancakes.  THe glaze is just that--the perfect blend of a bit of strawberry sauce with fresh
column5: served with a bit of powdered sugar on the side.  I didn't even use butter or syrup
column6: they were so delicious.  Service was excellent.  Even though the restaurant was busy
column7: the server took the time to describe their signature multiberry pancakes.  And the check came and was processed promptly!
